definition: to do something at one go/to flow smoothly
one/1/single/a (article)/as soon as/entire/whole/all/throughout/"one" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 1)/also pr. [yao1] for greater clarity when spelling out numbers digit by digit
gas/air/smell/weather/to make angry/to annoy/to get angry/vital energy/qi
expel breath/my goodness
variant of 啊[a1]
to succeed/to finish/to complete/to accomplish/to become/to turn into/to be all right/OK!/one tenth
surname Cheng

sentences.english: The whole show at one go, the magnificent atmosphere, shocking the audience.
sentences.chinese: 整场演出一气呵成，恢宏大气，震撼全场。

sentences.english: With good preparations, he got his graduation thesis done at one go.
sentences.chinese: 由于前期准备充分，他的毕业论文一气呵成。

sentences.english: Many differences, can't do things in one take.
sentences.chinese: 做事多有分歧，不能一气呵成。

sentences.english: You can install a huge number of popular software at one go with this tool.
sentences.chinese: 用了它你可以一气呵成地下载浩如烟海的流行软件。

sentences.english: Three processes in the same pot at one go.
sentences.chinese: 三个工序在同一锅内一气呵成。

sentences.english: Straight ahead usually requires more pre-planning.
sentences.chinese: 一气呵成的方法可能更要求有好的规划。

sentences.english: It is so wonderful that I wanner to read the next one immediately!
sentences.chinese: 它是如此的精彩，以至于我立即读下去，一气呵成。

sentences.english: No weighing, along with the gender of freedom in one take, became the appearance.
sentences.chinese: 没有称量，自由随性的一气呵成，就成了上图的模样。

definition: lit. moving clouds and flowing water (idiom)/fig. very natural and flowing style of calligraphy, writing, etc/natural and unforced
to link up (disparate elements)/coherent (narrative, argument etc)
(of speech or actions) direct and efficient/without fooling around
squeaky clean/neat and tidy/efficient
lit. wading in mud and water/a slovenly job/sloppy
to finish (a letter, a painting) at a stroke
adept/skilled
flowing (of speech, writing)/fluent/smooth and easy
terse/succinct
lit. slap the table and shout with praise (idiom); fig. wonderful!/amazing!/great!
fine work/carefully and neatly done
exquisite/fine and delicate (usu. of works of art)
to resemble nature itself/of the highest quality (idiom)
ingenious/clever/ingenuity/artifice
movement/motion/action/CL:個|个[ge4]
deft/nimble/ingenious
